description:
Merino is standard issue for next to skin insulation. It works with your body's own heating and cooling system to keep your core temperature where you want it. These heavier-weight bottoms have seamless knit-in ventilation panels and articulation so you can perform at a high level in very cold weather without sacrificing comfort.

  • Heavyweight merino wool wicks fast to keep you dry, and is naturally antimicrobial
  • Intraknit zoned construction puts insulation and ventilation where you need it most
  • Body-mapped articulation ensures unrestricted movement
  • Slim fit hugs your body for easy layering
  • Seamless knitting produces less waste than traditional cut-and-sew methods
name: Smartwool Intraknit Thermal Merino Base Layer 3/4 Bottoms - Women's
